history.proof: intros plp pl incl. srun best use: pl_path_rec_equiv_1_3 unfold: pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def.

tactic: induction incl as [| plp a la ls [Hincl IHincl] | plp a la ls [Hincl IHincl] Hnon_empty].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

original: intros plp pl incl. induction incl as [| plp a la ls [Hincl IHincl] | plp a la ls [Hincl IHincl] Hnon_empty]. - intros d tl n Hrec Hlen. inversion Hrec; subst. apply rec_empty. - intros d tl n Hrec Hlen. inversion Hrec; subst. apply rec_st with l1. + eapply IHincl. * apply H2. * inversion Hlen; subst; auto. + auto. - intros d tl n Hrec Hlen. destruct plp. + contradiction. + inversion Hrec; subst. apply rec_st with ls. * eapply IHincl. -- apply H2. -- inversion Hlen; subst. apply H8. * apply H6.
